summary: A down-on-his-luck businessman organizes an excursion to Sir Henry Morgan's Island for a treasure hunt only to encounter a mysterious phantom and murder.
cast: Dick Foran|Leo Carrillo|Peggy Moran|Fuzzy Knight|John Eldredge|Lewis Howard|Hobart Cavanaugh|Walter Catlett|Ralf Harolde|Iris Adrian|Foy Van Dolsen|Emmett Vogan|Robert Barron|Ted Billings|Eddy Chandler|Don Dillaway|Walter Tetley
keywords: map|wooden leg|heebie jeebies as slang|reference to bluebeard|reference to shakespeare's hamlet
title: Horror Island
